text.text: Cathedral of the Good Shepherd is also known as the Mother Church of the Catholic Church in Singapore üá∏üá¨ Every time you step into here, you are filled with a sense of awe yet a strong sense of contemplation. This building is filled with so much history and I am glad they preserve it so well. Our son was baptised here in 2022, my wife and I got married here in 2019, while I was confirmed as a Catholic here during Easter Vigil 2017 after going through RCIA 2017/2018 üôèüèª Will always hold a special place in my heart. Easily accessible in the heart of town, just beside Singapore Management University literally too. Bras Brasah MRT station is nearest, but also walking distance from City Hall MRT station and Bencoolen MRT station. Parking available here but more guaranteed parking next door at Singapore Management University School of Business car park.

text.text:
Singapore has so many beautiful temples of different religions. This temple has been honored as a National Monument. It is really very bright, beautiful and cozy temple. I was lucky to get here when the ritual of children's baptism took place. The abbot of the temple conducted the service first inside and then went outside with the parents and babies.
There is an organ inside, so ask when you can listen to the sounds of this beautiful instrument.
Don't forget to donate to the temple, there are special charity boxes at the entrance.

text.text: Beautiful and peaceful place to come. I came here for the Sunday Mass. Thank God I can get the seat inside the church. Really enjoy how the people welcome me. They do have a little museum for us to enjoy and dig in the history behind every corner.

originalText.text: Beautiful and peaceful place to come. I came here for the Sunday Mass. Thank God I can get the seat inside the church. Really enjoy how the people welcome me. They do have a little museum for us to enjoy and dig in the history behind every corner.

text.text: The church had a beautiful building, a great atmosphere, and a reverent Mass. However, I encountered a minor issue during communion. Despite the presence of a wonderful communion rail, receiving communion on the tongue was unpleasant. One of the extraordinary ministers seemed to slap the host onto my tongue, almost causing it to fall off.

originalText.text: The church had a beautiful building, a great atmosphere, and a reverent Mass. However, I encountered a minor issue during communion. Despite the presence of a wonderful communion rail, receiving communion on the tongue was unpleasant. One of the extraordinary ministers seemed to slap the host onto my tongue, almost causing it to fall off.

text.text: A beautiful sanctuary in the heart of the city for moments of peace, reflection & prayer. The home of the Catholic Archdiocese of Singapore welcomes all visitors - including non-Catholics - in every season. 10.30AM Mass every Sunday with the Cathedral Choir of the Risen Christ is my personal favourite for the superb quality of music!
